meanings.definition: A person who communicates by letters or emails with another.
meanings.sent1: My pen pal and I are regular correspondents, sharing updates through letters.
meanings.sent2: The correspondents exchanged emails to stay in touch while living in different countries.
meanings.sent3: The two pen pals were such dedicated correspondents that they filled up their entire mailbox!
meanings.sent4: Their email correspondence was like a digital bridge connecting their distant worlds as correspondents.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pen pal correspondents writing letters under the moonlight was enchanting.

meanings.definition: A person who contributes news or commentary to a newspaper, magazine, or broadcast organization.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper correspondents reported live from the scene of the accident.
meanings.sent2: The magazine correspondents wrote an in-depth article about the local community.
meanings.sent3: The correspondents at the press conference had a friendly competition to get the best scoop.
meanings.sent4: The broadcast correspondents' voices carried the news across the airwaves to listeners far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The image of the newspaper correspondents typing furiously to meet the deadline was impressive.
